overview: TNA Wrestling's LockDown 2012 was a historic night in the hometown of "Cowboy" James Storm; Nashville, Tennessee. Storm battles for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship against former tag-team partner Bobby Roode in an intense steel cage match. The one-time partners will fight it out inside the four sides of steel for the title and their pride. An unforgettable eight man Lethal LockDown match determines which Bischoff, tyrannical Eric or his up-and-coming son Garett, will be permitted to continue a career in the TNA organization and use the Bischoff name. All this and much more is showcased during this historic night in Nashville at "LockDown 2012".
title: TNA Lockdown 2012
